comment: Lots of photos from the Florida Panhandle. When I went down there on Wednesday, the mainstream media was more interested in Trump calling Stormy Daniels "Horseface." This was as bad if not worse than Katrina and it was in the news for less than a week
amr:
# ::snt Lots of photos from the Florida Panhandle. When I went down there on Wednesday, the mainstream media was more interested in Trump calling Stormy Daniels "Horseface." This was as bad if not worse than Katrina and it was in the news for less than a week
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / photo
            :quant (l / lot)
            :source (l2 / local-region
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Florida"
                        :op2 "Panhandle")))
      :snt2 (ii / interest-01
            :ARG1 (m2 / media
                  :ARG1-of (m3 / mainstream-02))
            :ARG2 (c / call-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Trump"))
                  :ARG1 (p3 / person
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Stormy"
                              :op2 "Daniels"))
                  :ARG2 (h / horseface))
            :time (g / go-02
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :ARG4 (t / there
                        :direction (d / down))
                  :time (d2 / date-entity
                        :weekday (w / wednesday)))
            :ARG2-of (h2 / have-degree-91
                  :ARG1 m2
                  :ARG3 (m4 / more)))
      :snt3 (a / and
            :op1 (h3 / have-degree-91
                  :ARG1 (t2 / this)
                  :ARG2 (b / bad-07
                        :ARG1 t2)
                  :ARG3 (e / equal)
                  :ARG4 (n4 / natural-disaster
                        :name (n5 / name
                              :op1 "Katrina")))
            :op2 (b2 / be-located-at-91
                  :ARG1 t2
                  :ARG2 (n6 / news)
                  :duration (l3 / less-than
                        :op1 (t3 / temporal-quantity
                              :quant 1
                              :unit (w2 / week))))))

comment: I've been in that area between Panama City and Tallahassee a bunch of times and it is largely White working class Old Florida people who live there
amr:
# ::snt I've been in that area between Panama City and Tallahassee a bunch of times and it is largely White working class Old Florida people who live there
(a / and
      :op1 (b / be-located-at-91
            :ARG1 (ii / i)
            :ARG2 (a2 / area
                  :mod (t / that)
                  :location (b2 / between
                        :op1 (c / city
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Panama"
                                    :op2 "City"))
                        :op2 (c2 / city
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Tallahassee"))))
            :frequency (t2 / time
                  :quant (b3 / bunch)))
      :op2 (p / person
            :mod (o / old)
            :ARG1-of (w / white-02)
            :mod (c3 / class
                  :ARG0-of (w2 / work-01))
            :ARG0-of (l / live-01
                  :location a2)
            :domain a2
            :degree (l2 / large)))

comment: The Redneck Riviera, I spent many spring breaks there.
amr:
# ::snt The Redneck Riviera, I spent many spring breaks there.
(s / spend-02
      :ARG0 (ii / i)
      :ARG1 (b / break-19
            :ARG0 ii
            :time (d / date-entity
                  :season (s2 / spring))
            :quant (m / many)
            :location (t / there))
      :ARG2 (ii2 / island
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Redneck"
                  :op2 "Riviera")))
